badge.title: Badge
badge.subtitle: Component for displaying notifications, counters and status indicators

basic.title: Basic Example
basic.description: Standard badge with numeric value. Displayed as simple indicator

severity.title: Color Schemes
severity.description: Badge color scheme is determined by `severity` property. Available variants: primary, secondary, contrast

size.title: Sizes
size.description: Badge size is controlled by `size` property. Available values: sm (small), lg (large)

maxValue.title: Maximum Value
maxValue.description: For numeric badges, maximum value can be set via `max` property. If value exceeds maximum, displayed as "max+"

customizations.title: Customization
customizations.description: Badge supports text values and custom content via `content` slot

overlay.title: Overlay on Elements
overlay.description: Badge can overlay other elements via `default` slot. `bordered` property adds border for better visibility

positionOverlay.title: Positioning
positionOverlay.description: Badge position relative to parent element is configured via `location` property. All 4 corners are available

button.title: Button Integration
button.description: Badge can be used as button property to display notification counters

argTypes.value: Badge value. Can be string or number
argTypes.size: Badge size. Affects font size and padding
argTypes.severity: Badge color scheme. Determines main color and style
argTypes.location: Badge position relative to parent element. Used only when there is content in default slot
argTypes.bordered: Adds border around badge for better visibility
argTypes.max: Maximum value for numeric badges. If value exceeds max, displayed as "max+"
argTypes.content: Shows custom content in content slot instead of standard value
argTypes.default: Shows content in default slot (e.g., button), relative to which badge is positioned
